# discord-custom-emoji

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property     | Attribute     | Description                                                                                                                           | Type      | Default     |
| ------------ | ------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ----------- |
| `embedEmoji` | `embed-emoji` | Determines whether or not the emoji is used in an embed, or a message. If it is used in an embed, the sizing is adjusted accordingly. | `boolean` | `undefined` |
| `name`       | `name`        | The name of the emoji                                                                                                                 | `string`  | `undefined` |
| `url`        | `url`         | The emoji URL to use in the message.                                                                                                  | `string`  | `undefined` |
